headline: Block Stock Jumps on S&P 500 Inclusion, Replacing Hess
summary: Block shares surged in extended trading Friday, after S&P Dow Jones Indices said the digital payments provider will be replacing Hess in the benchmark S&P 500 Index next week.

raw.headline: Block Stock Jumps on S&P 500 Inclusion, Replacing Hess
raw.summary: Block shares surged in extended trading Friday, after S&P Dow Jones Indices said the digital payments provider will be replacing Hess in the benchmark S&P 500 Index next week.

headline: The Trade Desk (TTD) Registers a Bigger Fall Than the Market: Important Facts to Note
summary: In the closing of the recent trading day, The Trade Desk (TTD) stood at $80.21, denoting a -1.51% move from the preceding trading day.

headline: Square Parent Block Jumps On S&P 500 News; Robinhood Snubbed Yet Again
summary: Square-parent Block will join the S&P 500 before Wednesday's open. Block stock jumped. Robinhood and AppLovin were snubbed yet again.

raw.headline: Square Parent Block Jumps On S&P 500 News; Robinhood Snubbed Yet Again
raw.summary: Square-parent Block will join the S&P 500 before Wednesday's open. Block stock jumped. Robinhood and AppLovin were snubbed yet again.

headline: Robinhood, AppLovin Could Soon Join S&P 500 as Hess Deal Creates Opening in Index
summary: Robinhood  Markets or  AppLovin  could gain admission to the S&P 500 now that an opening has been created with Chevron’s acquisition of Hess Friday.  There has been ongoing speculation that  Robinhood  and  AppLovin  could join the  because they are the largest U.S. companies based on market capitalization that aren’t now in the benchmark index.  AppLovin is valued at $123 billion and Robinhood at $93 billion.
